title: Major train fault affecting North-South Line travel time

title_translations.zh-Hans: 影响南北线行车时间的主要列车故障
title_translations.ms: Gangguan kereta utama yang mempengaruhi waktu perjalanan Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் பயண நேரத்தை பாதிக்கும் பெரிய ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train svcs btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton have resumed. Free regular bus svcs have ended.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to a train fault, pls add 10mins train travel time btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton. Free regular bus svcs from #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 25mins train travel time btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton. Free regular busbetween #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 25mins train travel time btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Newton.
